userTemplates.template:
#### For JetBrains IDEs # .idea # Ignore everything but code style settings and run configurations # that are supposed to be shared within teams. .idea/* !.idea/codeStyles !.idea/runConfigurations
# Plugins # mpeltonen/sbt-idea plugin .idea_modules/ # JIRA plugin atlassian-ide-plugin.xml # Crashlytics plugin (for Android Studio and IntelliJ) com_crashlytics_export_strings.xml crashlytics.properties crashlytics-build.properties fabric.properties # CMake cmake-build-*/
# File-based project format *.iws
# Build out/

#### For Auto-import # Comment if not using maven/gradle auto-import. *.iml *.ipr
#### For Maven target/ pom.xml.tag pom.xml.releaseBackup pom.xml.versionsBackup pom.xml.next release.properties dependency-reduced-pom.xml buildNumber.properties .mvn/timing.properties # https://github.com/takari/maven-wrapper#usage-without-binary-jar .mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar
#### For Gradle .gradle **/build/ !src/**/build/ # Ignore Gradle GUI config gradle-app.setting # Avoid ignoring Gradle wrapper jar file (.jar files are usually ignored) !gradle-wrapper.jar # Avoid ignore Gradle wrappper properties !gradle-wrapper.properties # Cache of project .gradletasknamecache

#### For Android # Generated files bin/ gen/ # Built application files *.apk *.ap_ *.aab # Files for the ART/Dalvik VM *.dex # Java class files *.class # Android Patch gen-external-apklibs # External native build folder generated in Android Studio 2.2 and later .externalNativeBuild # Mobile Tools for Java (J2ME) .mtj.tmp/
# Signing files .signing/ # Local configuration file (sdk path, etc) local.properties # Keystore files *.jks *.keystore # Google Services (e.g. APIs or Firebase) google-services.json
# Log Files *.log # virtual machine crash logs (Reference: http://www.java.com/en/download/help/error_hotspot.xml) hs_err_pid*
# Android Studio /*/build/ /*/local.properties /*/out /*/*/build /*/*/production captures/ .navigation/ *~ *.swp
# NDK obj/
# Package Files # *.war *.ear
